Question: This person was commonly considered to be the "discoverer of America" in popular culture, his true legacy today is more nuanced.
Hints: This person was born before 31 October 1451 in Genoa, part of modern Italy.
The Santa María was owned by Juan de la Cosa and captained by this person.
This person, for his part, continued to the northern coast of Hispaniola, where he landed on 5 December.
